original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Eastern & Oriental Express
overview: Singapore is a city of gardens & the heart of South East Asia. It is here that the journey begins on the Eastern & Oriental Express, a nostalgic train journey that has all the exotic atmosphere of colonial times. Travel north to Kanchaburi & to the bridge on the River Kwai, a somewhat inconspicuous bridge that once brought infamy to this region
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Eastern & Oriental Express
